name: Queever
title: Archivist
notes: Primary Archivist. Custodian of major manuscripts.

title: Provenance Engine Developer
notes: Developed the Provenance Engine for document verification.

name: Minor Archivist Trell

name: Oric Valdun

notes: Author of On Archive Licensing. Defined legal framework.

name: Pella Valdun

notes: Daughter of Oric. Established provenance standards.

name: Hork Staven
title: Expert Witness Coordinator
notes: Specialized in Yeller Quarry family tree disputes.

name: Mara Yent

notes: Investigated forgeries. Died before publishing findings.

name: Mink Pavar

name: Shop Keeper Marsh

notes: Operates one of the round-window shops.
